Author: Hermes#6934
Content:
from CIpi "could be you are experiencing this issue: https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/BarterDEX/issues/128
AYWA has the default datadir/conf-file in an unusual location... ~/.aywacore/aywa.confinstead of ~/.aywa/aywa.conf, so the coins database entry for AWYA contains the additional parameter "conffile": https://github.com/jl777/coins/blob/master/coins#L78
BarterDEX needs to be able to find and open the coins config file
Look after this config file and check if it contains at least this entries
server=1
rpcuser=whatever
rpcpassword=whatever"

Author: Aywa Developers#3627
Content: @Hermes dash has the same default location: dashcore/dash.conf

Content: looks like problem with using native mode

Author: plazma#1625
Content: Can i switch between litemode and native of kmd in agama and use native pirate at the same time

Author: Acura#2748
Content: Yes you can use lite mode kmd and pirate native at the same time

Author: plazma#1625
Content: @Acura i want to use native kmd and pirate native but if situation call like net problem in future then i wana switch back to litemodo of kmd.....is it possible

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: You should export the keys in Lite mode https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000024495-export-komodo-privatekeys-using-agama and import it  in native mode

Author: plazma#1625
Content: @Hermes yes i use komodo native i got a new wallet

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: If you  want to switch to lite mode make sure you have the private keys of the address that has your funds in native , with this private key you can enter the lite mode version of the wallet when you need it

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000024489-generate-a-new-address-and-export-private-keys-in-agama

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: The guide above show how this is done , with this private  you can access the lite mode version of the wallet when you need

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: But I will recommend to see the guides for native first if you started using it

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/folders/29000054289

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: When you export the private keys in native mode remember that this private key is only for one specific address

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: And this private key can be used in lite mode the same way as you use your seed and you will be able enter only  that specific address

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Finally I will just advise to read more about in the guides üòâ

Author: kmdbrt_test#4033

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Remember that Hyperdex is matching the closest order based in your balance and your utxo ...so if you have 20 and the closest utxo that works is for 19 it will take this as reference...this is based in UTXOs not like other exchanges

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Regarding to the privacy question Barterdex needs transparent addresses and transactions to be able to see what‚Äôs happening that‚Äôs it‚Äôs main use

Content: if it was a fresh installation it shouldn't happen but maybe the program got executed twice and it was running in the moment...

Content: I would make sure restarting the PC again and making just sure that the application is only executed one time when clicking in the .exe file
